name: specific_skin
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cs_skin_api.
Tool description: retrieve image, price, weapon, class for every released Skin in CS:GO or CS2
API description: retrieve name, price, icon, class and weapon for a specific counterstrike skin 
(prices for field tested condition in USD)

(replace skin_name, underscores instead of spaces)

Example: /api/AK-47_Redline

skin_name.description: The name of the Counter-Strike skin, with underscores instead of spaces. Example: 'AK-47_Redline'.
